titleStmt.title: The great calumny of The Quakers despising the Holy Scriptures, refuted out of their printed books, unjustly perverted, confusedly curtail'd and crowded, by William Mather in his Dagger-sheet.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, William, of Durham.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle, in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-street,

notesStmt.note: In ms. at the bottom of page: by Wm. Robinson of Durham.
Imperfect: folded with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
